title: Sinkhar
description: An ancient city, located in modern Syria, with remains of an ancient church and residential buildings. Inscribed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2011 as part of the "Ancient Villages of Northern Syria."

properties.description: Center of the ruins of the ancient city of Sinkhar. Coordinates determined by eye in Google Earth in October 2012, following description in UNESCO World Heritage List.
properties.title: Ancient City of Sinkhar
